info.label: Did you know?
info.tooltip: You can share what you see in the app. All share options will preserve the current map view, visible layers, and open popups.

link.label: Copy Link
link.tooltip: Click to copy link to clipboard

facebook.label: Facebook
facebook.tooltip: Click to share to your Facebook account

twitter.label: Twitter
twitter.tooltip: Click to share to your Twitter account

linkedIn.label: LinkedIn
linkedIn.tooltip: Click to share to your LinkedIn account
